name: Markus Küttner
background: Markus Küttner serves as Head of RTL Entertainment at RTL, focusing on overall factual entertainment strategy.
thematic_priorities: Commercial factual formats with broad appeal
High-impact documentaries with broad mainstream appeal
Character-driven factual series featuring compelling, relatable individuals
Access-led documentary series into German institutions or communities
History documentaries with dramatic storytelling and broad appeal
Science programming accessible to mainstream audiences
Focus on sensational or mystery-driven content
budget_parameters: Documentary: €100K–€200K per hour; Specialist Factual: €80K–€180K per hour
technical_requirements: Subtitles/captions; audio description as per broadcaster requirements
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above
submission_process: One-page outline with headline, premise and format
additional_info: Submissions accepted year-round unless strand-specific; emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen; encouragement of sustainable production practices.
